org.numenta.nupic.monitor

Interface ComputeDecorator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MonitoredTemporalMemory, TemporalMemory

    public interface ComputeDecorator
    Decorator interface for main algorithms
    Author:
    cogmission

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComputeCycle compute(Connections connections, int[] activeColumns, boolean learn)
      Feeds input record through TM, performing inferencing and learning
      void reset(Connections connections)
      Called to start the input of a new sequence, and reset the sequence state of the TM.

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        ComputeCycle compute(Connections connections,
                     int[] activeColumns,
                     boolean learn)
        Feeds input record through TM, performing inferencing and learning
        Parameters:
        connections - the connection memory
        activeColumns - direct activated column input
        learn - learning mode flag
        Returns:
        ComputeCycle container for one cycle of inference values.

      • reset

        void reset(Connections connections)
        Called to start the input of a new sequence, and reset the sequence state of the TM.
        Parameters:
        connections - the Connections state of the temporal memory
